# `bazr`

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/barnabywalker/bazr.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/barnabywalker/bazr)

`bazr` is a package containing functions that I find useful, so I don't have to keep defining them in all my projects.

## Installation

You can install `bazr` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("barnabywalker/bazr")
```
